description: Can be played on the Nintendo DS by transferring the DPG file to a DS-compatible GameBoy Advance card. May also be played back on a PC using supporting player.

NOTE: Several programs can be used for converting standard video files to the DPG format, including dpg4x and DPG Converter. However, to play a DPG file in Windows, use the dpgshow.exe program included with the Moonshell download.
